ruleEntry.formula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status),ISPICKVAL(Status,"Resolved"), RecordType.Name = "Technical Support")

AND( ISNEW() , RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ), OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email To Case'), OR(Contact.Email='tyler.sandison@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='ashley.veach@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='michael.hanan@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='b.susko@fluencebioengineering.com') ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Market__c , 'Produce'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Market__c , 'Ornamental') ), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Channel__c , 'Direct'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-LATAM') ) ) ) )

AND( ISNEW() , RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ), OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email To Case'), OR(Contact.Email='andrew.mahr@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='adam.edwards@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='logan.patterson@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='tim.kiefer@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='aaron.fellabaum@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='alex.randolph@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='ryley.leech@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='casey.rivero@fluencebioengineering.com') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Market__c , 'Cannabis'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Channel__c , 'Direct'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-LATAM') ) ) ) )

AND( ISNEW() , RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ), OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email To Case'), OR(Contact.Email='michael.lucchino@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='emily.miller@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='marc.miller@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='finn.decaulp@fluencebioengineering.com', Contact.Email='eric.fowler@fluencebioengineering.com') ), AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Channel__c , 'AR'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Channel__c , 'PAR') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'Americas-LATAM') ) ) ) )

AND( ISNEW() , RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ), OR ( AND( ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email To Case'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'EMEA') ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'APAC'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Region__c , 'EMEA') ) ) )
AND( ISNEW() , RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ), OR ( ISPICKVAL( Origin , 'Email To Case'), ISPICKVAL( Contact.Account.Channel__c , 'Ecomm') ) )

AND( RecordType.Name ='LDRF' ,Submit_case__c,ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c),!ISPICKVAL( Status, 'FAE Review'),OR(ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Region__c, 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM'), ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Region__c, 'APAC') ))
AND( RecordType.Name ='LDRF' ,Submit_case__c,ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c),!ISPICKVAL( Status, 'FAE Review'),RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL( Opportunity__r.Region__c, 'EMEA'))

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Region__c , 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Cannabis'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c , 'Direct'), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail), OR( AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'General', RecordType.Name = 'RMA'), Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c, OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED( Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ))), AND(RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL(Status,'FAE Review'), ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c), Submit_case__c)))

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Ornamental'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Produce'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Research')), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail ),OR (ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'Direct'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'Research')), OR( AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'General', RecordType.Name = 'RMA'), Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c = true, OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED( Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ))), AND(RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL(Status,'FAE Review'), ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c), Submit_case__c)))

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'AR'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'PAR')), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail ), OR( AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'General', RecordType.Name = 'RMA'), Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c, OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED( Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ))), AND(RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL(Status,'FAE Review'), ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c), Submit_case__c)))

AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'EMEA'), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail ), OR( AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'General', RecordType.Name = 'RMA'), Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c, OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED( Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c ))), AND(RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL(Status,'FAE Review'), ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c), Submit_case__c),AND(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning')))

AND( OR(AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'General', RecordType.Name = 'RMA'), Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c, OR(ISNEW(),ISCHANGED( Is_Tech_Support_Needed__c))), AND(RecordType.Name = 'LDRF', ISPICKVAL(Status,'FAE Review'), ISCHANGED(Submit_case__c), Submit_case__c)), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'APAC'), Account.BillingCountry = 'Australia', ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail ) )

AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c , 'APAC'), ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='General', NOT(ISNEW()))

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Account.Region__c , 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Cannabis'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c , 'Direct'), OR(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning',RecordType.Name ='Technical Support') )

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Ornamental'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Produce'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Market__c , 'Research')), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'Direct'),OR(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning',RecordType.Name ='Technical Support'))

AND( OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-NA'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c, 'Americas-LATAM')), OR(ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'AR'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Channel__c, 'PAR')), OR(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning',RecordType.Name ='Technical Support'))
AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c , 'APAC'),OR(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning',RecordType.Name ='Technical Support'), Account.BillingCountry = 'Australia')
AND( ISPICKVAL( Account.Region__c , 'APAC'),OR(RecordType.Name = 'Commissioning',RecordType.Name ='Technical Support'), Account.BillingCountry <> 'Australia')
